extendedInfo.description: Calorie Counter PRO, from the #1 health website Everyday Health, makes reaching your goal weight easier than ever before! Set goals, track calories consumed AND burned, find friends, and read expert advice â all from your Android device. We created the best user experience of any dieter tracker:Features:â¢ FASTEST calorie search for food and exercise availableâ¢ SMARTEST auto suggest - instant results as you typeâ¢ FEWEST number of taps to enter a new foodâ¢ PRECISE and customizable calorie counts for any food and quantity, including foods, store brands, and restaurant foodsâ¢ WORKS OFFLINE without internet connectionYour customized Calorie Counter will automatically sync up with EverydayHealth.com, your personalized health site for managing every aspect of your health and weight:â¢ Most up-to-date diet, nutrition, and fitness tips from the industry's top expertsâ¢ Exclusive access to celebrity weight-loss secretsâ¢ Community support from thousands of active online membersâ¢ Customized meal plans, exercise programs, weight tracker, food and fitness journal and diary, shopping lists, BMI calculator and 1,000+ healthy recipesâ¢ All your data and goals will be backed up onlineSupports versions 2.1 and higher.

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: Why are there ads on the paid version?  And even though I deleted a custom food I created online, it still shows up as an available food on my phone.  Needs to sync online & phone better.  Would be nice to scan a food\'s barcode and have its nutrition info import automatically.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No diffrence
reviews.comment: there\'s no difference between this and the free ones so why spend a buck 99
reviews.author: Kristie Metcalf
